Title: Afternoon of the Bulls
Writer: Manuel Tamayo (story), Julio Coll (story), Manuel Tamayo (screenplay), Julio Coll (screenplay), José Santugini (screenplay)
Actors: Domingo Ortega, Antonio Bienvenida, María Asquerino, Marisa Prado
Plot: Sellout in the bullring of Las Ventas in Madrid. A luxury poster is about to deal a cattle from Antonio Pérez Tabernero. A spontaneous jumps into the ring, the wife of one of those bullfighters is expecting a child secretly, one of the matadors is prey to nerves during slaughter, some spectators are cheering and discussed among themselves - Halfway between documentary and fiction, carries out this production which, as its title suggests, revolves around a bullfight.
